subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
We are a U.S Base Investment Company offering Corporate and Personal Investment Funding at a 2~7% ROI for a duration of   10 Years. Kindly have our membership card at 40 dollars only and also sign our Agreement / MOU Clearance you will be  guaranteed to have a non collateral loan of 100  to 10million dollars with credit union loan investment company, we  
also offer 1%  to individuals who introduce  project owners for finance or other opportunities.
Please get back to me if you are interested in more details.
Yours faithfully,
MR. MATTHEW JAMES CRUZ
DIRECTOR LOAN FEDERAL SERVICE CREDIT UNION
Investment Analyst
Direct Phone: +13018249216
Fax number;   +13015907872
Email:  
cruzmatthew1980@gmail.com
Office Email. 
admindept@servicecrd.com

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Mr. Matthew James Cruz,

Thank you for reaching out and providing such detailed information about your investment company. It sounds like a great opportunity! I'm intrigued by the idea of personal investment funding.

Could you please elaborate more on how the ROI works over the years? Also, I'm curious about the membership card. What are its benefits and what does it entail?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Gene

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Gene

I am glad to hear from you, as you can see,   The ROI formula is: (profit
minus cost) / cost. If you made $10,000 from a $1,000 effort, your return
on investment (ROI) would be 0.9,

Also the membership ID CARD, can guarantee your NEXT OF KIN to get loan in
our company without any collateral

Please have your time and indicate the exact amount you will required from
us for your Project investment plans
Thanks

MR. MATTHEW JAMES CRUZ
DIRECTOR LOAN FEDERAL SERVICE CREDIT UNION
Investment Analyst
Direct Phone: +13018249216
Fax number;   +13015907872
Email:  cruzmatthew1980@gmail.com
Office Email. admindept@servicecrd.com

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Mr. Matthew James Cruz,

It's a pleasure to hear from you! I'm intrigued by the ROI formula you've mentioned, it sounds like a great way to measure the success of an investment. Could you perhaps explain it in more detail? 

The membership ID CARD also sounds interesting. How does it work exactly? And how can my next of kin benefit from it?

As for the loan amount, I'm still in the process of finalizing my project investment plans. Could you tell me more about the range of loan amounts your company offers?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Gene

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Gene

We offer portfolios worth between USD$1M to USD$1B
Thanks

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Gene,

That sounds interesting! Could you please provide more details about these portfolios? What kind of investments do they include? And how does the process work?

Thanks for your time.

Best wishes,
Gene
